column2:
"Ugh... It's so cold here...
Crawford couldn't have sent me to a nicer place, huh..."
"Tell you what, though, this place used to have a pretty mild climate. Green as far as the eye could see."
"But there was a sudden change in the climate, and now it's this snowy, ice-covered wasteland."
"Amazing what can happen in just a hundred years, huh..."
